mapper.select: SELECT mat_id as "matId", cli_id as "cliId", mat_cd as "matCd", mat_nm as "matNm", cd.det_nm as "matUnit", mat_price as "matPrice", mat_comm as "matComm", mat_reg_date as "matRegDate", mat_mod_date as "matModDate", mat_is_active as "matIsActive" FROM material m left join code_detail cd on m.mat_nm = cd.det_nm ORDER BY mat_id DESC

SELECT mat_id as "matId", cli_id as "cliId", mat_cd as "matCd", mat_nm as "matNm", cd.det_nm as "matUnit", TO_CHAR(mat_price, 'FM999,999,999') as "matPrice", mat_comm as "matComm", TO_CHAR(mat_reg_date,'yyyy-MM-dd') as "matRegDate", TO_CHAR(mat_mod_date,'yyyy-MM-dd') as "matModDate", mat_is_active as "matIsActive" FROM material m left join code_detail cd on m.mat_unit = cd.det_id
SELECT det_id, det_nm FROM code_detail WHERE cod_id = 'mat_unit'
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO material( cli_id, mat_cd, mat_nm, mat_price, mat_unit, mat_comm, mat_reg_date, mat_is_active ) VALUES ( #{cli_id, jdbcType=NUMERIC}, #{mat_cd, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{mat_nm, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{mat_price, jdbcType=NUMERIC}, #{matUnit, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{mat_comm, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{mat_reg_date, jdbcType=DATE}, 'Y' )
mapper.select: SELECT mat_id as id, mat_nm as name FROM material
